messages.title: Recent messages
messages.greeting: Welcome to the student simulator! Earn 300 credits in five years to graduate. Good luck with your studies!
messages.burnout: You're burned out, you need to rest
messages.rest: You rested for a day and feel a little better.
messages.study: You studied for a day and receive one credit.
messages.work: You worked for a day. Your wages are due by the last day of the month.
messages.rent: It's the fifth of this month. Rent is due.
messages.applyForJobFailure: You applied for a job. Unfortunately they decided to go with another candidate. Better luck next time.
